rose_day: Roses are red, violets are blue, my heart beats only for you! 🌹 Happy Rose Day, my love!
propose_day: I choose you today, tomorrow, and always! 💍 Will you be mine forever?
chocolate_day: You are sweeter than the finest chocolates! 🍫 Happy Chocolate Day!
teddy_day: You are my cuddle buddy for life! 🧸
promise_day: I promise to love you in every moment, forever and always! ❤️
hug_day: A warm hug to melt away all worries! 🤗
kiss_day: A kiss to seal our love forever! 💋
valentines_day: You are my heart, my soul, my everything. 💖 Happy Valentine's Day!
